title: Killmore Series Box Set
description: By BESTSELLING author Martha Sweeney I never planned for my life to end up with an abusive husband, a corrupt boyfriend, and being used by everyone including the Feds. Lies are told to protect people, especially when I'm thrown into witness protection. Nightmares eventually become my reality and I'm thrust face to face with devil who brings my past life back in a way I never expected. In time, some people die, truths are revealed, and I'm is forced to chose--to either fight or give up completely and let the devil have my soul.Will I be able to outwit the Devil or will I die trying?An action-packed, espionage romantic suspense thriller series (2 books) that will keep you on the edge of your seat!
author: Martha Sweeney
